articles.title: Teacher Wins $1M From $90K Bet on Morocco While He Says He Was Instructing Volleyball Class - The Action Network
articles.description: Read about how a teacher from New York won $1 million from a $90K bet on Morocco -- while he says he was instructing a volleyball class.
articles.content: On Tuesday morning, a 20-something-year-old teacher from New York said he was instructing elementary school kids how to play volleyball, trying to distract himself from his bet that could return $1 m… [+4151 chars]
